name: Spacer Racer
description:
Spacer Racer is a practice project where I explored a simple art style based on primitive 3D objects, and an idea of making everything in the world destructible.

You can run through three laps trying to get the best overall race time while avoiding hazards... or you can just go around and destroy everything you have in sight just for the fun of it.

I wasn't planning on expanding the project, but should you have any wishes / suggestions, feel free to post them in the comments or contact me via e-mail, and I'll try to oblige.

WASD to move, space for the upward thrust, UpArrow to shoot.

Enjoy!
